column1: A bunch of people are standing or sitting in a snow valley .
A number of people standing and laying under a mountain covered in snow .
Sledding and skiing enthusiasts gather at a snowy rock formation .
Snow skiers gather at the bottom of a snowy hill .
Some people hanging out in the snow .
At the bottom of a set of stairs , there are two men and a tent .
Men in a khaki-colored tent outside in a rundown area .
People in a tent shelter near the bottom of stairs .
